document.full_text: over one thousand protesters in hong kong took to the streets to demand the release of detained chinese artist and human rights activist ai weiwei on saturday, scuffling briefly with police.
document.title: thousands march in hong kong to demand release of china's ai
lines_and_colors: over one thousand protesters in hong kong took to the streets to demand the release of detained chinese artist and human rights activist ai weiwei on saturday, scuffling briefly with police.
